summary: A fairly simple mod that adds a campsite in the wilderness, slightly North of Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is a rather simple mod that I had originally made for personal use, but later decided that I might as well release it :). This was my first time trying out the Creation Kit, so I thought I\'d make something useful to my character.[/center]
[center][size=+2][u][color=darkturquoise]Hunter\'s Campsite[/color][/u][/size][/center]

[center]It adds a campsite in the wilderness made with hunters in mind. It\'s easily accessible, as it has a custom fast-travel marker. It also has a few other things which would be useful to a hunter such as: storage, a tanning rack, a cooking spit and a bedroll. I\'ve made sure to try and small details such as hay and logs lying around so it looks a little nicer.

[color=red]The chest should be safe to store your items in but I\'m not really too sure about the barrels and sack.The chest was copied from a vanilla player house, to be on the safe side but there\'s a chance the other stuff may reset.[/color]

v1.1
--------------
- Added lighting to the candle by the chest
- Added a path texture to the floor leading to the ramp

Endorsements would be greatly appreciated if you enjoyed using the mod ;)[/center]

[center]Installation: Just drag and drop it into your Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data folder, just like any other mod with just one .esp and enjoy.[/center]

-liamcas
author: liamcas
